value.subject: Bring Family Safety to your phone
value.bodyPreview:
Bring Family Safety to your phone | View it online


Bring Family Safety to your phone
Empower you and your family to create healthy habits with the digital safety features you already know, plus location sharing
 Get the app



Develop healthy d

body.content:
Bring Family Safety to your phone | View it online
 
Bring Family Safety to your phone
Empower you and your family to create healthy habits with the digital safety features you already know, plus location sharing
 Get the app 
Develop healthy digital habits
Set screen time limits on Xbox, Windows, and Android and get a summary of your family's digital activity to start a conversation.
 
Choose the right content
Create a safe space with web and search filters to block mature content and set kid-friendly websites on Microsoft Edge.
 
 
Locate your loved ones
Stay connected even when you're apart. See loved ones on a map with location sharing* and save places they visit most.
 Get the app 
Your privacy is important to us
We work around the clock to help protect your data and information and do not sell or share your location data with insurance companies or data brokers.
* Location sharing must be active.
This email was sent from an unmonitored mailbox. You are receiving this email because you have a Microsoft account. Privacy Statement.
Unsubscribe
Microsoft Corporation,
One Microsoft Way,
Redmond, WA 98052 USA

value.subject: Simplify endpoint management and deployment
value.bodyPreview:
Having trouble viewing this email? | View as web page

Take the hard work out of hardware - simplify your device management




WEBINAR
July 29, 2020 | 2:00 PM ET / 11:00 AM PT

See how Surface and Microsoft 365 can simplify remote device deploy

body.content:
Having trouble viewing this email? | View as web page
 
Take the hard work out of hardware - simplify your device management
 
 
 

WEBINAR
July 29, 2020 | 2:00 PM ET / 11:00 AM PT

See how Surface and Microsoft 365 can simplify remote device deployment and lifecycle management

Managing endpoint devices in todays remote workforce can be complex. A mix of desktops, laptops, tablets, and smartphones spread across a wide variety of locations can make deployments frustrating when everything doesnt work together.

In this webinar, well look at how a Surface device, deployed and managed with Microsoft 365, reduces workloads and costs for IT, while greatly enhancing employee experience.

Well walk through:

  • Device lifecycle from factory assignment to a Microsoft 365 tenant all the way to redeploying or retiring the device.
  • Windows Autopilot deployment and Microsoft Intune management, from OS to UEFI.
  • A white-glove deployment, including cloud-based policies and settings, Office and line-of-business applications, and tailoring your end customers setup experience.

After this webinar, youll have an understanding of the advantages of using a device built for Microsoft 365, the ins and outs of cloud-based device deployment with Surface, and the tools needed to transition your infrastructure to Microsoft 365 modern management.

 
Take the hard work out of hardware - simplify your device management

 
Register now >
   
 
   
 
 
 
 

Privacy Statement | Unsubscribe

 

Microsoft Corporation
One Microsoft Way
Redmond, WA 98052
